p: Blood was collected from the brachial plexus of anesthetized mice in heparinized tubes for total and differential leukocyte count and for serum. Leukocytes were quantified in an optical microscope (Zeiss ICS Standard 25) using a Neubauer chamber and mounted microscope slides in Turk staining. Results are presented as leukocyte count per mL of blood and percentage relative to total leukocyte count.
